title: How sivir/gnar's AA's should work.
body:
Their weapons are returning ones, it looks so wrong to see sivir throw her glaive and another just appears in her hand afterwards.

why not make them like this:

they throw the weapon and after it hits an enemy it returns to them, as soon as they catch it, it is ready to throw again (in other words they have max attack speed all the time) however to takes a while for the weapon to return, and buying attackspeed instead of decreasing the time between launching attacks, it decreases the travel time of the boomerang as it comes back. so the time between actually damaging an enemy is exactly the same, but now it looks like a boomerang instead of looking like her having 1000000000000000 giant boomerangs hidden somewhere in her pockets.

replies.body:
They're doing it for graves... So why not. 
90% ad on hit the return does 20% (It could go just past them)
